Armor-Piercing Rounds.description: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% / stack) to bosses.
Armor-Piercing Rounds.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

Backup Magazine.description: Add +1 (+1 / stack) charge of your Secondary skill.
Backup Magazine.name: Backup Magazine
Backup Magazine.flavorText: Add an extra charge of your Secondary skill.

Bundle of Fireworks.description: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 / stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.
Bundle of Fireworks.name: Bundle of Fireworks
Bundle of Fireworks.flavorText: Activating an interactable launches fireworks at nearby enemies.

Bustling Fungus.description: After standing still for 2s, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% / stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m / stack).
Bustling Fungus.name: Bustling Fungus
Bustling Fungus.flavorText: Heal all nearby allies after standing still for 2s.

Cautious Slug.description: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.
Cautious Slug.name: Cautious Slug

Crowbar.description: Deal 150% (+50% / stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.
Crowbar.name: Crowbar
Crowbar.flavorText: Deal more damage to healthy enemies.

Energy Drink.description: Sprint speed is improved by 30% (+20% / stack).
Energy Drink.name: Energy Drink

Fresh Meat.description: Increases base health regeneration by +2 hp/s for 3s (+3s / stack) after killing an enemy.
Fresh Meat.name: Fresh Meat
Fresh Meat.flavorText: Regenerate health after killing an enemy.

Gasoline.description: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m / stack). Enemies burn for 150% (+75% / stack) base damage.
Gasoline.name: Gasoline
Gasoline.flavorText: Killing enemies sets nearby enemies on fire.

Item Scrap, White.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, White.name: Item Scrap, White
Item Scrap, White.flavorText: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Lens-Maker's Glasses.description: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% / stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.
Lens-Maker's Glasses.name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
Lens-Maker's Glasses.flavorText: Chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

Medkit.description: 2s after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% / stack) of maximum health.
Medkit.name: Medkit
Medkit.flavorText: Receive a delayed heal after taking damage.

Monster Tooth.description: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% / stack) of maximum health.
Monster Tooth.name: Monster Tooth
Monster Tooth.flavorText: Drop a healing orb on kill.

Personal Shield Generator.description: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% / stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.
Personal Shield Generator.name: Personal Shield Generator

Repulsion Armor Plate.description: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 / stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.
Repulsion Armor Plate.name: Repulsion Armor Plate
Repulsion Armor Plate.flavorText: Receive flat damage reduction from all attacks.

Rusted Key.description: A hidden cache containing an item will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity of the item per stack).
Rusted Key.name: Rusted Key
Rusted Key.flavorText: Gain access to a Rusty Lockbox that contains treasure.

Sticky Bomb.description: 5% (+5% / stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.
Sticky Bomb.name: Sticky Bomb
Sticky Bomb.flavorText: Chance on hit to attach a bomb to enemies.

Stun Grenade.description: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2s.
Stun Grenade.name: Stun Grenade

Topaz Brooch.description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 / stack).
Topaz Brooch.name: Topaz Brooch
Topaz Brooch.flavorText: Gain a temporary barrier on kill.

Tougher Times.description: 15% (+15% / stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.
Tougher Times.name: Tougher Times

Tri-Tip Dagger.description: 15% (+15% / stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.
Tri-Tip Dagger.name: Tri-Tip Dagger
Tri-Tip Dagger.flavorText: Chance to bleed enemies on hit.

Warbanner.description: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m / stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.
Warbanner.name: Warbanner
Warbanner.flavorText: Drop a Warbanner on level up or starting the Teleporter event. Grants allies attack and movement speed.

AtG Missile Mk. 1.description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% / stack) TOTAL damage.
AtG Missile Mk. 1.name: AtG Missile Mk. 1

Bandolier.description: 18% (+10% / stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.
Bandolier.name: Bandolier
Bandolier.flavorText: Chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

Berzerker's Pauldron.description: Killing 3 enemies within 1s sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s / stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.
Berzerker's Pauldron.name: Berzerker's Pauldron
Berzerker's Pauldron.flavorText: Enter a frenzy after killing 3 enemies in quick succession.

Chronobauble.description: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s / stack).
Chronobauble.name: Chronobauble

Death Mark.description: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7s (+7s / stack).
Death Mark.name: Death Mark
Death Mark.flavorText: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, taking bonus damage.

Fuel Cell.description: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 / stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% / stack).
Fuel Cell.name: Fuel Cell
Fuel Cell.flavorText: Hold an additional equipment charge. Reduce equipment cooldown.

Ghor's Tome.description: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.
Ghor's Tome.name: Ghor's Tome
Ghor's Tome.flavorText: Chance on kill to drop a treasure.

Harvester's Scythe.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 / stack) health.
Harvester's Scythe.name: Harvester's Scythe

Infusion.description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 / stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 / stack) health.
Infusion.name: Infusion
Infusion.flavorText: Killing an enemy permanently increases your health, up to 100.

Item Scrap, Green.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, Green.name: Item Scrap, Green
Item Scrap, Green.flavorText: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Kjaro's Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% / stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10s.
Kjaro's Band.name: Kjaro's Band
Kjaro's Band.flavorText: High damage hits also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado. Recharges over time.

Leeching Seed.description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 / stack) health.
Leeching Seed.name: Leeching Seed

Lepton Daisy.description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 / stack) times.
Lepton Daisy.name: Lepton Daisy
Lepton Daisy.flavorText: Periodically release a healing nova during the Teleporter event.

Old Guillotine.description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% / stack) health.
Old Guillotine.name: Old Guillotine
Old Guillotine.flavorText: Instantly kill low health Elite monsters.

Old War Stealthkit.description: Chance on taking damage to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 3s (+1.5s / stack). Chance increases the more damage you take.
Old War Stealthkit.name: Old War Stealthkit
Old War Stealthkit.flavorText: Turn invisible on taking heavy damage.

Predatory Instincts.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% / stack) attack speed.
Predatory Instincts.name: Predatory Instincts
Predatory Instincts.flavorText: 'Critical Strikes' increase attack speed. Stacks 3 times.

Razorwire.description: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 / stack) targets in a 25m (+10m / stack) radius
Razorwire.name: Razorwire
Razorwire.flavorText: Retaliate in a burst of razors on taking damage.

Red Whip.description: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% / stack).
Red Whip.name: Red Whip

Rose Buckler.description: Increase armor by 30 (+30 / stack) while sprinting.
Rose Buckler.name: Rose Buckler

Runald's Band.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s / stack) and dealing 250% (+250% / stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10s.
Runald's Band.name: Runald's Band
Runald's Band.flavorText: High damage hits also blasts enemies with runic ice. Recharges over time.

Squid Polyp.description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% / stack) attack speed. Lasts 30s.
Squid Polyp.name: Squid Polyp
Squid Polyp.flavorText: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret nearby.

Ukulele.description: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 / stack) targets within 20m (+2m / stack).
Ukulele.name: Ukulele

War Horn.description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s / stack).
War Horn.name: War Horn
War Horn.flavorText: Activating your Equipment gives you a burst of attack speed.

Wax Quail.description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m / stack).
Wax Quail.name: Wax Quail
Wax Quail.flavorText: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward.

Will-o'-the-wisp.description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m / stack) radius for 350% (+280% / stack) base damage.
Will-o'-the-wisp.name: Will-o'-the-wisp

57 Leaf Clover.description: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 / stack) times for a favorable outcome.
57 Leaf Clover.name: 57 Leaf Clover

Aegis.description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% / stack) of the amount you healed.
Aegis.name: Aegis
Aegis.flavorText: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier.

Brainstalks.description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s / stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.
Brainstalks.name: Brainstalks
Brainstalks.flavorText: Skills have NO cooldowns for a short period after killing an elite.

Brilliant Behemoth.description: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+1.5m / stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.
Brilliant Behemoth.name: Brilliant Behemoth

Ceremonial Dagger.description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% / stack) base damage.
Ceremonial Dagger.name: Ceremonial Dagger
Ceremonial Dagger.flavorText: Killing an enemy releases homing daggers.

Defensive Microbots.description: Shoot down 1 (+1 / stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5s. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.
Defensive Microbots.name: Defensive Microbots
Defensive Microbots.flavorText: Shoot down nearby projectiles. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

Dio's Best Friend.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3s of invulnerability.
Dio's Best Friend.name: Dio's Best Friend

Frost Relic.description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 600% damage per second. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 1m. Stacks up to 6m (+6m / stack).
Frost Relic.name: Frost Relic
Frost Relic.flavorText: Killing enemies surrounds you with an ice storm.

H3AD-5T v2.description: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with speed. Recharges in 10s (-50% / stack).
H3AD-5T v2.name: H3AD-5T v2
H3AD-5T v2.flavorText: Increase jump height. Hold 'Interact' to slam down to the ground.

Happiest Mask.description: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s / stack).
Happiest Mask.name: Happiest Mask
Happiest Mask.flavorText: Chance on killing an enemy to summon a ghost.

Hardlight Afterburner.description: Add +2 (+2 / stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.
Hardlight Afterburner.name: Hardlight Afterburner
Hardlight Afterburner.flavorText: Add 2 extra charges of your Utility skill. Reduce Utility skill cooldown.

Interstellar Desk Plant.description:
On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5s.

The plant heals for 10% of maximum health every second to all allies within 5m (+5.0m / stack). Lasts 10s.
Interstellar Desk Plant.name: Interstellar Desk Plant
Interstellar Desk Plant.flavorText: Plant a healing fruit on kill.

Item Scrap, Red.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, Red.name: Item Scrap, Red
Item Scrap, Red.flavorText: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

N'kuhana's Opinion.description: Store 100% (+100% / stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.
N'kuhana's Opinion.name: N'kuhana's Opinion

Resonance Disc.description: Killing enemies charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% / stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% / stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% / stack).
Resonance Disc.name: Resonance Disc
Resonance Disc.flavorText: Obtain a Resonance Disc charged by killing enemies. Fires automatically when fully charged.

Sentient Meat Hook.description: 20% (+20% / stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 / stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.
Sentient Meat Hook.name: Sentient Meat Hook
Sentient Meat Hook.flavorText: Chance to hook all nearby enemies.

Shattering Justice.description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8s (+8s / stack).
Shattering Justice.name: Shattering Justice
Shattering Justice.flavorText: Reduce the armor of enemies after repeatedly striking them.

Soulbound Catalyst.description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s / stack).
Soulbound Catalyst.name: Soulbound Catalyst

Unstable Tesla Coil.description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 / stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10s.
Unstable Tesla Coil.name: Unstable Tesla Coil

Wake of Vultures.description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s / stack).
Wake of Vultures.name: Wake of Vultures
Wake of Vultures.flavorText: Temporarily steal the power of slain elites.

Artifact Key.description: A stone shard with immense power.
Artifact Key.name: Artifact Key
Artifact Key.flavorText: A stone shard with immense power.

Genesis Loop.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30s / (2 +1 / stack).
Genesis Loop.name: Genesis Loop
Genesis Loop.flavorText: Fire an electric nova at low health.

Halcyon Seed.description: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% / stack) damage and 100% (+100% / stack) health.
Halcyon Seed.name: Halcyon Seed
Halcyon Seed.flavorText: Summon Aurelionite during the Teleporter event.

Item Scrap, Yellow.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.
Item Scrap, Yellow.name: Item Scrap, Yellow
Item Scrap, Yellow.flavorText: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

Little Disciple.description: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% / stack) damage. Fires every 1.6s while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.
Little Disciple.name: Little Disciple

Mired Urn.description: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 / stack) characters to you within 13m will be 'tethered' to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.
Mired Urn.name: Mired Urn
Mired Urn.flavorText: Siphon health from nearby characters while in combat.

Molten Perforator.description: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% / stack) damage each.
Molten Perforator.name: Molten Perforator
Molten Perforator.flavorText: Chance on hit to fire magma balls.

Queen's Gland.description: Every 30s, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 / stack) Guards at a time.
Queen's Gland.name: Queen's Gland

Shatterspleen.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% / stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% / stack) of their maximum health.
Shatterspleen.name: Shatterspleen
Shatterspleen.flavorText: Critical strikes always bleed enemies. Bleeding enemies now explode.

Titanic Knurl.description: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 / stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s / stack).
Titanic Knurl.name: Titanic Knurl

Brittle Crown.description:
30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 / stack) gold. Scales over time.

Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% / stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.
Brittle Crown.name: Brittle Crown
Brittle Crown.flavorText: Gain gold on hit... BUT lose gold on getting hit.

Corpsebloom.description: Heal +100% (+100% / stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (reduced by 50% / stack) of your health per second.
Corpsebloom.name: Corpsebloom
Corpsebloom.flavorText: Double your healing... BUT it's applied over time.

Defiant Gouge.description: Using a Shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales over time.
Defiant Gouge.name: Defiant Gouge
Defiant Gouge.flavorText: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby.

Focused Convergence.description: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% / stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% / stack) smaller.
Focused Convergence.name: Focused Convergence
Focused Convergence.flavorText: Increase the speed of Teleporter charging... BUT reduce the size of the zone.

Gesture of the Drowned.description: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% / stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.
Gesture of the Drowned.name: Gesture of the Drowned
Gesture of the Drowned.flavorText: Dramatically reduce Equipment cooldown... BUT it automatically activates.

Mercurial Rachis.description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% / stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.
Mercurial Rachis.name: Mercurial Rachis
Mercurial Rachis.flavorText: Randomly create a Ward of Power. ALL characters deal bonus damage while in the Ward.

Purity.description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2s (+1s / stack). All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 / stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.
Purity.name: Purity
Purity.flavorText: Reduce your skill cooldowns by 2s. You are unlucky.

Shaped Glass.description: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% / stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% / stack).
Shaped Glass.name: Shaped Glass
Shaped Glass.flavorText: Double your damage... BUT halve your health.

Strides of Heresy.description:
Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.

Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 18.2% (+18.2% / stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3s (+3s / stack).
Strides of Heresy.name: Strides of Heresy

Transcendence.description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% / stack) maximum health.
Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.flavorText: Convert all your health into shield. Increase maximum health.

Visions of Heresy.description:
Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.

Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 / stack) that reload after 2s (+2 / stack).
Visions of Heresy.name: Visions of Heresy
Visions of Heresy.flavorText: Replace your Primary Skill with 'Hungering Gaze'.

Focus Crystal.description: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 15% (+15% / stack).
Focus Crystal.name: Focus Crystal
Focus Crystal.flavorText: Deal bonus damage to nearby enemies.
